segments.text: Dad , where are we off to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First we will go to the city centre and stop for something to drink . Then we will visit the University Museum .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where are we going to have a drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a coffee shop round the corner . Can you see that big building at the end of the road ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is a bank . The coffee shop is opposite the bank .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . I will have hot chocolate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A stop ! Wait for the lights to turn green .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When crossing the road you must always pay attention to what's around you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry . How far is the museum ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am not sure . We will ask for directions in the coffee shop .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here we are . You find us a table and I'll get the drinks .
segments.speaker: S2
